node.text: When I was searching for a chef to prepare meals for our family of nine adults and two children  at our rental villa in Sicily I never imagined I would find such an amazing person as chef Fabio. He and his staff were extremely accommodating and flexible with my menu requests and the meals were traditional but prepared with his own unique flair. We were treated to complimentary wines chosen by chef Fabio with each course the first night which we enjoyed so much that we added wine to each course for the next two dinners as well.  He and his staff shopped, prepared, served and left an immaculate kitchen after each meal. The Villa was an hour from Catania and quite remote and a bit difficult to access but he took it all in stride. I Canâ€™t say enough about his professionalism, organization and ability to produce such wonderful meals with such attention to detail. But most of all we were so fortunate to have shared his love and passion for food and wine. If you are in need of a personal chef while in Sicily, I can highly recommend chef Fabio. You will not be disappointed!

We had a BEAUTIFUL meal and local wine pairing from Private Chef Catania. He met with our Air Bnb host before the meal and made sure he had everything he needed to proved a memorable experience for all of us. We all had the best time!
It was our first time in Sicily and this experience was both delicious and relaxing. The use of local ingredients and wines was an added touch! We hope to dine with Private Chef Catania again!

Thank you so much!

One of the top 5 meals I have ever had.  Chef Simone was absolutely terrific.  He was on time, polite, took care of everything from ingredients, to cookware and of course cooking.  There aren't enough wonderful things I can say about my experience.

Chef Fabio cooked a lovely 5 course dinner, he was very easy to work with, created changes to the menu and went out of the way to get a special cake and candles for our celebration. Food was excellent. Highly recommended!
Chef Fabio is highly recommended. He made us the best meal we have ever had in Sicily. The drink pairing was also perfect. Thank you again for the unforgettable experience.

first_description.first_description: We are one of the best solutions in Sicily that guarantees high quality at home chef services. Our decades of experience allows us to satisfy the most refined and elaborate needs.

second_description.second_description: Whether it's a dinner for two or a special event with dozens of guests, we will offer a unique and high-level experience. Ours is a 360-degree service, we take care of the customer from the moment he chooses the menu to table service.

bio.bio: Born in Catania, between the slopes of Etna and the coasts of eastern Sicily, the place of origin of multiple culinary traditions inspired by the union between land and sea. My passion was born in the kitchen at home, during the preparation of Sunday family lunches, using ingredients from all over Sicily. Those same aromas, pleasing to the nose and palate, continue to be a source of inspiration, both to rediscover the ancient flavors and to reinvent myself in new dishes. I was lucky enough to be able to expand my knowledge even outside my country, among the best French and English cuisines. Knowing the beloved native flavors and those of the rest of the world that intrigued me, I was able to invent menus ready to satisfy any palate. My goal is to satisfy these palates, in the intimacy of home, giving rise to the concept of in home chef for you!
